control.name: 6.5.6 - Address all "high risk" detected vulnerabilities
control.desc: All vulnerabilities identified by an organization's vulnerability risk-ranking process (defined in Requirement 6.1) to be "high risk" and that could affect the application should be identified and addressed during application development.

test.steps: 6.5.6 Examine software-development policies and procedures and interview responsible personnel to verify that coding techniques address any "high risk" vulnerabilities that could affect the application, as identified in PCI DSS Requirement 6.1.
